text: Jalaludin Rakhmat (29 August 1949 â€“ 15 February 2021) was an Indonesian politician. He was a member of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle. He was a lecturer at Padjadjaran University. Rakhmat was a member of the People's Representative Council from 2014 until 2019. Rakhmat was born in Bandung, Indonesia. Rakhmat died on 15 February 2021 in Bandung from COVID-19, aged 71. ==References== Category:Indonesian politicians Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Indonesia
title: Jalaludin Rakhmat
